summary.span: 为 DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件提供数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于事件为提供的值**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件并使您能够指定为当前请求的自定义 Windows 标识。The class is used to supply event values to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request. 构造对象使用当前和将其传递给**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象构造对象使用当前和将其传递给**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The object constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 你可以使用属性对象提供给**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值属性所引用的属性，设置属性到不包含用户的对象信息。If you do not specify a value for the property of the referenced by the property, the sets the property of the to a object that contains no user information. **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**后引发事件事件和之前事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the event and before the event. 如果你有一个部分，其中取决于要拒绝或允许访问应用程序的用户名称，修改属性的当前可能会影响你的应用程序的行为。If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the property of the current can affect the behavior of your application. 请确保在设置的用户名称**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件被视为时在你配置中指定部分。Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the section in your configuration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件来测试是否属性的当前是`null`。The following code example uses the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to test whether the property of the current is `null`. 如果属性是`null`，该示例设置属性的当前到对象其中属性对象是对象"default"属性值。If the property is `null`, the example sets the property of the current to a object where the property of the object is a object with a property value of "default". > [!NOTE] > **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件之前，将引发事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised before the event. 因此，如果你设置属性的当前到自定义标识，它可能会影响你的应用程序的行为。As a result, if you set the property of the current to a custom identity, it can affect the behavior of your application. 例如，如果你使用类并且你在确保只有经过身份验证的用户才能访问到你的站点，通过使用部分中，并指定``，将在此示例中被忽略，导致该元素，如用户将具有名称、这是"默认设置"。For example, if you are using the class and you are ensuring that only authenticated users have access to your site, by using the section and specifying ``, you will cause the element in this example to be ignored, as the user will have a name, which is "default". 作为替代，你将指定``以确保只有经过身份验证的用户才能访问你的站点。Instead you would specify `` to ensure that only authenticated users can access your site.
